visual_style_summary: A minimal and clean visual style, highlighting the luxurious craftsmanship of the ring against a sleek black background. The focus is on the sharp and focused lighting to accentuate the reflective brilliance of the diamonds and the transcendent glow of the yellow gold.

scenes.description: The scene opens with an extreme macro shot focused on the central round diamond of the ring, perfectly capturing its facets and brilliant cut.
scenes.lighting_setup: Sharp, focused lighting from a diffused source positioned to highlight the diamond’s brilliance and avoid overexposure.

scenes.description: The camera transitions smoothly to a slightly wider macro shot as the ring gently rotates, revealing the pave-set diamond details along the band and the split shank design.
scenes.lighting_setup: Focused lighting on the side to cast subtle shadows, emphasizing the split shank's structure and pave-set diamonds.

scenes.description: A medium macro shot provides a full view of the ring, capturing its polished yellow gold sheen, reflecting light naturally and elegantly.
scenes.lighting_setup: Soft, broad lighting from the top to evenly illuminate the ring's reflective surface.

technical_notes: Lens choice: 100mm Macro Lens with an f-stop of 2.8 to ensure precise focus on the diamonds and gold texture. Lighting should be managed to prevent any overexposed highlights and to maintain a clear view of all jewellery details. The rotating platform should be stable and smooth to ensure seamless motion.
